discussion.author: ErikBuer
discussion.text:
This is the continuation on work stemming from this PR:
https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/137378

I'm guessing updating the version made this a new PR, even though the old was not yet merged.

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text:
> I'm guessing updating the version made this a new PR, even though the old was not yet merged.

Yes, definitely avoid changing the version number when updating a registration.

Other than that, you’ll have to go on Slack to ask for a manual merge from a registry maintainer

[noblock]

discussion.author: ErikBuer
discussion.text:

Okay. Thank you for the help!
